subject: Hockey, Ice

College Athletics
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Mr. Harkness was the general manager for the Detroit Red Wings and one of two coaches to win N.C.A.A. championships at different colleges.
snippet: Mr. Harkness was the general manager for the Detroit Red Wings and one of two coaches to win N.C.A.A. championships at different colleges.
